Text:
Languages: Dutch, French and Spanish 

NO ENGLISH!

Should have mentioned that MitsEvX...

I mentioned that this was a dutch version, so I meant that it was playable in a dutch language! I'm sorry for not checking enough and forgetting to notice a french and spanish language option....Maybe I assumed  too fast that there's wasn't any other language available  ;-)

Thanks for mentioning those languages, I can't add those, because the edit function still doesn't work..... :/
